def is_water_source_present(source:item):
    # Determine whether there is a water source available
    symbol is_present=exists x: item : (is_faucet(x) or is_water_dispenser(x)) and close(x, source)
    return is_present

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists source: item : is_sink(source) and is_water_source_present(source):
            # If there is already a known sink with a water source, approach it
            bind source: item where:
                is_sink(source) and is_water_source_present(source)
            achieve close_char(char, source)

        else:
            # Check all sinks in the scene that have not been visited for water sources
            foreach source: item:
                if is_sink(source) and not visited(source):
                    observe(source, "Check is there a water source such as a faucet or dispenser")
